TopicTitle: Game crashing when loading (FMOD/ Audio Problem)

Articles.Content:
Whenever the game is launched either as normal or 64bit, from steam or standalone launcher the game crashes and produces an error log. On steam someone had suggested this maybe be due to audio drivers, stopping the "AudioSrv" service in Windows task manager -> services did prevent the crash but it also led to no sound, updated my audio drivers for my motherboard, uninistalled and deleted any unused audio devices & drivers too. Are there any known fixes to this? I have multiple PC's and it works fine on the bad one and crashes on the good one, not cool! Just as a side note I have tried reverting to older versions on Steam, verified my files and reinstalled it etc.

The log can be found here: http://pasted.co/f46451b2

Thanks!
Please also tell us your hardware configuration. A DxDiag file would be most useful.
